definition[0]: to temporarily do someone else’s job or take their place
example[0]: Would you mind standing in for me for a while?
definition[1]: someone who does the job or takes the place of someone else for a short time
example[1]: Gilbert failed to find a stand-in and so could not go to the party.
definition[2]: someone who takes the place of an actor for some scenes in a film
definition[3]: to temporarily do someone else’s job
example[3]: Can you stand in for Meg while she’s on vacation?
